actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the application of the uniform capitalization rules to certain farming businesses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from the required application of uniform inventory cost capitalization rules any sod and ornamental or crop-producing trees produced by the taxpayer in a farming business.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the application of the uniform capitalization rules to certain farming businesses.
